column4: I need help with connecting to mysql, the php code is correct but I don't know what the server or username is : ( I tried with root at localhost.
how do you use mysql from the shell?

I think I know the user btw. I created the password and user in shell. But on php i logged in with root and the password. So I thought I could use the user root in my php too but maybe I should have used the created user which I don't remember haha.
use mysql to reset the user's password with the root acount?
